  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(int pPlayers, int pGamemode, java.lang.String pPlayer1, java.lang.String pPlayer2, int pColours, int pStartingPlayer, int pHints)
      Constructor for building a new game
      Parameters:
      pPlayers - The number of players
      pGamemode - The gamemode to be played
      pPlayer1 - The name of the first player
      pPlayer2 - The name of the second player
      pColours - The colour options
      pStartingPlayer - The player to make the first move
      pHints - The hints option
